3. Ensure visual elements support and highlight the call to action
4. Optimize graphics for diverse media platforms
5. Review and adjust visuals based on audience reception

tasks.task_name: present tutorial information clearly
checklists: 1. Organize content for easy understanding and follow-along
2. Use clear and concise language throughout the tutorial
3. Break down complex concepts into manageable steps
4. Include on-screen text or visuals to reinforce key points
5. Solicit feedback to ensure clarity and make necessary adjustments

tasks.task_name: design interactive and engaging tutorials
checklists: 1. Incorporate interactive elements such as quizzes or tasks
2. Engage viewers with questions or prompts for comments
3. Vary content delivery methods to maintain interest (e.g., video, animation, text overlays)
4. Adjust pacing to keep viewers engaged without overwhelming them
5. Evaluate engagement through analytics and viewer feedback

tasks.task_name: ensure tutorials are visually attractive
checklists: 1. Use high-quality visuals that complement instructional content
2. Design a consistent and attractive visual theme
3. Employ graphics and animations to illustrate concepts effectively
4. Maintain a clean and uncluttered layout
5. Test visual appeal with target audience and refine based on feedback
